game.name: Shadows of the Afterland
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 텍스트 크기 조절, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Madrid, 1960: A maid named Pilar dies. You arrive in the afterlife looking like Pilar but speaking as Carolina, a police officer from the future. Possess the living and cross between worlds to uncover the truth behind a soul split between two identities in this point-and-click adventure.
